comments.content: You can try Kinokuniya Book Store: [http://www.kinokuniya.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121224130/http:/www.kinokuniya.com/ "http://www.kinokuniya.com/")

I think Kinokuniya is the best place I know in the city (especially since they’ve moved to a new store location)

But another good option is Asahiya, which has a nice selection of imported Japanese magazines.  
 [http://www.yelp.com/biz/asahiya-bookstores-new-york-inc-new-york](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121224130/http:/www.yelp.com/biz/asahiya-bookstores-new-york-inc-new-york)
